scripts.build-watch: npx concurrently "npm run build-watch:webpack" "npm run build-watch:scss" "npm run build-watch:internal-apps" "npm run build-watch:android"
scripts.build-watch:android: npx concurrently "npm run build:android-assets" "chokidar 'www/**/*' -c 'npm run build:android-assets'"
scripts.build-watch:web: npx concurrently "npm run build-watch:webpack" "npm run build-watch:scss" "npm run build-watch:internal-apps"
scripts.build: npm run build:webpack && npm run build:scss && npm run build:internal-apps && npm run build:android-assets
scripts.build:production: rm -rf android/app/src/main/assets/* && npx webpack --env production && npx sass --no-source-map --style=compressed src/styles.scss www/dist/styles.css && node ./scripts/build-internal-apps.js --production && npm run build:android-assets && echo Compilation completed.
scripts.build:debug: rm -rf android/app/src/main/assets/* && npx webpack && npx sass --no-source-map src/styles.scss www/dist/styles.css && node ./scripts/build-internal-apps.js && npm run build:android-assets && echo Compilation completed.
scripts.debug:android: npm run build:debug && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd .. && adb install android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk && adb shell am start -n web.bmdominatezz.gravy/web.bmdominatezz.gravy.MainActivity
